entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 2:21PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Elevated Surf Along The Coast Today Through Friday... Elevated surf and erosion is possible along the coast from the Colville River to Kaktovik Thursday through Friday. Southwesterly winds to 25 mph with gusts to 40 mph tonight will shift to the west on Thursday. As the wind shifts, this may cause waves to crash high up the beach.
